live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.

Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53866.summary: Some customers in the Newton area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53866.title: Oct 2 - Surrey (Newton) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
